functionDecorators.name: converterType
functionDecorators.description: returns the converter type the factory is associated with.

functionDecorators.name: createConverter
functionDecorators.description: creates a new converter with the given arguments and transfers the ownership to the caller.

parameterDecorators.name: _registry
parameterDecorators.description: address of a contract registry contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _maxConversionFee
parameterDecorators.description: maximum conversion fee, represented in ppm.
